block.spatialcrafting.x2crafter_piece.in: Place 4 of these in a 2x2 pattern to form the multiblock
block.spatialcrafting.x3crafter_piece.in: Place 9 of these in a 3x3 pattern to form the multiblock
block.spatialcrafting.x4crafter_piece.in: Place 16 of these in a 4x4 pattern to form the multiblock
block.spatialcrafting.x5crafter_piece.in: Place 25 of these in a 5x5 pattern to form the multiblock
